headline: Is DTE Energy (DTE) Now Fairly Priced After Strong Multi Year Share Price Gains
summary: If you are wondering whether DTE Energy is fairly priced or offering value at its current level, you are not alone. Utilities are often seen as core holdings in many portfolios. The stock last closed at US$144.69, with total returns of 5.0% over 7 days, 6.8% over 30 days, 11.0% year to date, 15.5% over 1 year, 41.8% over 3 years and 59.6% over 5 years. This provides plenty of history for investors to consider. Recent news coverage around DTE Energy has focused on its role as a regulated...

headline: Mizuho Maintains Outperform on DTE Energy, Raises Price Target to $155
summary: Mizuho  analyst Anthony Crowdell   maintains DTE Energy (NYSE:DTE) with a Outperform and raises the price target from $144 to $155.
